metadata.title: CVE-2018-14463 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
The VRRP parser in tcpdump before 4.9.3 has a buffer over-read inprint-vrrp.c:vrrp_print() for VRRP version 2, a different vulnerabilitythan CVE-2019-15167.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-14463` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

tcpdump - 4.9.3-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: tcpdump package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.9.3-0ubuntu0.16.04.1').
